name: Students of BBA, MBA,FASS, CS, CSSE, CSE, CIS & SE programs who have enrolled for Internship in SUMMER 2020-2021 Semester are required (Mandatory requirement for all  internship enrolled students) to send soft copy of their resume by following the  instructions below:

Please note that Original Documents Submission (as per the following list) is a standard and mandatory process for all Freshman Students. As the pandemic situation has again deteriorated, the previously posted deadline of mandatory document submission of Freshman students of Summer 2019-20, Fall 2020-21 and Spring 2020-21 is hereby postponed and will be announced later. Students are advised to check the noticeboard of the homepage regularly for updated information.
To whomever applicable, students are advised to clear their remaining 3rd Installment of Tuition Fees of Spring 2020-21 semester and all other account dues by Thursday, April 15, 2021.
It is to notify to all concerned that the University will remain closed (including all online classes) on Tuesday, March 30th 2021 due to Shab e-Barat, 2021.
